description: My name is Mikhaila Fuller. I’m co-founder and CEO of Peterson Academy, an online higher-education platform and host a podcast with over a million and a half subscribers. I’ve spent 14 years researching autoimmunity because I was dying from it....
title: Senate Speech: The Case for Using Ketogenic and Plant-Free Ketogenic Diets to Treat Chronic Illness

description: I am speaking today as a clinical research scientist—an endeavour with which I have some familiarity, having conducted many such studies, and being aware of their difficulty, as well as a clinician and sometime philosopher of science. We will start...
title: Senate Round Table September 23, 2024
